MAN.TITLE: vdgetframe
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Grabs and returns a frame from a video file

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: The returned frame/image. If no frame, return 0.

DESCRIPTION.P: vdgetframe grabs and returns a frame from an opened video file. It can only get the current frame and move to the pointer to the next frame.

AUTHORS.AUTHORS_ITEM: Shiqi Yu <yushiqi (AT) yahoo DOT com DOT cn>

SECTION.label: Bugs and Shortcomings
